OLED.name: OLED
OLED.description: Highest picture quality with perfect black and infinite contrast. Each pixel emits light independently.

QNED.name: QNED
QNED.description: Combination of Quantum Dot and NanoCell with Mini LED backlight for bright and vivid picture with excellent contrast.

NanoCell.name: NanoCell
NanoCell.description: NanoCell technology ensures clean and accurate colors by filtering unwanted tones.

LED.name: LED
LED.description: Classic LED technology offers reliable picture at an affordable price.
